import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import FeatureCard from '../components/FeatureCard'; import LoadingSpinner from '../components/LoadingSpinner'; const Home = () => { const [recentSkills, setRecentSkills] = useState([]); const [loading, setLoading] = useState(true); const [error, setError] = useState(null); useEffect(() => { const fetchRecentSkills = async () => { try { setLoading(true); const response = await fetch('/api/skills'); if (!response.ok) { throw new Error('Failed to fetch skills'); } const data = await response.json(); // Sort by export date (newest first) and take the first 3 const sortedSkills = data.sort((a, b) => new Date(b.exportDate) - new Date(a.exportDate) ).slice(0, 3); setRecentSkills(sortedSkills); setLoading(false); } catch (error) { setError(error.message); setLoading(false); } }; fetchRecentSkills(); }, []); return (

AIRA Robot Skill Export

Create, manage, and export skills for your AIRA Humanoid Robot with our intuitive web interface.

Control 14 body servos and 12 hand servos, save positions, and export directly to ARC format.

Create New Skill View My Skills

Recent Skills

{loading ? ( ) : error ? (
{error}
) : recentSkills.length === 0 ? (

You haven't created any skills yet.

Create Your First Skill
) : (
{recentSkills.map(skill => (
{skill.name}

{skill.description || 'No description provided'}

Created: {new Date(skill.exportDate).toLocaleDateString()}

View Details
))}
)}
View All Skills

Getting Started

  1. Navigate to the Create Skill page
  2. Enter skill information (name, description, author)
  3. Adjust servo positions using the interactive controls
  4. Save positions with meaningful names
  5. Export your skill in your preferred format
  6. Import the exported skill into Synthiam ARC software
Learn More

About AIRA Humanoid Robot

The AIRA Humanoid Robot uses the ez-b V4 smart robot controller to control 14 servos for the body and 12 servos for the hands through Synthiam ARC software.

Our tool provides an intuitive interface for configuring these servos, saving positions, and exporting the resulting skills in formats compatible with ARC.

With our 3D visualization, you can see exactly how your robot will move before exporting your skill.

Start Creating
); }; export default Home;
